articles.description: When Red Sox slugger Justin Turner hit a foul ball in the bottom of the ninth on Saturday night, Yankees broadcaster John Sterling didn't think it was going to hit him in the head.
articles.content:
New York Yankees legendary radio play-by-play announcer John Sterling wasnt prepared for a foul ball flying into his broadcast booth during the teams game against the Red Sox on Saturday night.
